briefTitle: A Study to Confirm the Efficacy and Safety of K-161 Ophthalmic Solution for Treatment of Moderate to Severe Dry Eye Disease
officialTitle: A Phase 3, Prospective, Double-masked, Randomized, Multi-center, Vehicle-controlled, Parallel-group, 12-week Administration and 40-week Extension Study Confirming the Efficacy and Safety of K-161 Ophthalmic Solution for the Treatment of Moderate to Severe Dry Eye Disease
summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the efficacy and safety of K-161 ophthalmic solution for the treatment of moderate to severe dry eye disease.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change in EDS (VAS) From Baseline to Day 85
